name: Nightmare Trap DEMO
description:
Billy has a terrible nightmare and he is trapped in it. Avoid traps, kill monsters and find the portal to escape. But before that, you have to find his teddy bear, Mr. Brum, becasuse he will not let his best friend there.

This is the demo version of the game, full version is in development.

If you played the game please leave a comment, i really appreciate it.

Controls:

Left, right - Arrows
Jump - Space/up 
Shoot - Ctrl
Climbing ladder - Up, down
Switch lever - Up
Pause - P

Stocka Games, ©2020
